definition: ever since a long time ago
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，我曾帮助过一位纳粹集中营幸存者。

sentences.english: This is one of the best novellas I've read in a long time.
sentences.chinese: 这是我长期以来读过的最优秀的中篇小说之一。

sentences.english: For a long time, Hong Kong has embraced the Eastern and Western cultures.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，中西方文化在香港相互辉映，相互交融。

sentences.english: The staff with the snake has long been a symbol of medicine and the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，由蛇盘绕的权杖系医学及医学界的标志。

sentences.english: Equivalence translation is one of the topics disputed about the translation theories.
sentences.chinese: 等值翻译是翻译理论界长期以来争论不休的话题之一。

sentences.english: Ruled by the Turks until1916, Jidda has long been used as a port by Moslem pilgrims making the journey to Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 吉达长期以来是穆斯林朝圣者通往麦加城的旅行港口。

sentences.english: China has long been led by exports and investment-driven economic boom has cooled.
sentences.chinese: 中国长期以来由出口和投资拉动的经济热潮已经降温。

sentences.english: The stratigraphic horizons have long been divided according to a lithostratigraphic boundary.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，地质分层采用岩石地层单位界面。

sentences.english: Cecilia Cheung's pregnancy had been a long-time focus of paparazzi.
sentences.chinese: 张伯芝怀孕的事情长期以来一直是狗仔队关注的热点。

sentences.english: We astrologers have known all about this for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们占星师长期以来就知道与它有关的一切。

sentences.english: America has long suspected China of developing anti-satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，美国一直都怀疑中国在研发反卫星技术。

sentences.english: Gbagbo thanked China for its long-term selfless assistance to Cote d'Ivoire.
sentences.chinese: 巴博感谢中国长期以来给予科特迪瓦的无私援助。

sentences.english: For a long time, the company is mainly engaged in non-standard building materials design and production.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，公司主要从事建材产品非标设计，生产。

sentences.english: The Zijin mining group had been discharging untreated water into the Tingjiang River for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 紫金矿业长期以来向汀江排放未经处理的废水。

sentences.english: So, for a long time Christianity in Guangzhou was in the first place in China.
sentences.chinese: 因此，长期以来，广州的基督教发展居全国之首。

sentences.english: For a long time debt in the rich world has grown faster than incomes.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，发达国家的债务增长一直快于收入的增长。

definition: in the past always/for a long time now/until now
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
